00015 // The structure that holds an eigencouple
00016 struct eigen{
00017     double r;            // Eigenvalue's real part
00018     double i;            // Eigenvalue's imaginary part
00019     double vlr[EIG_MAX]; // Left-eigenvector's real part
00020     double vli[EIG_MAX]; // Left-eigenvector's imaginary part
00021     double vrr[EIG_MAX]; // Right-eigenvector's real part
00022     double vri[EIG_MAX]; // Right-eigenvector's imaginary part    
00023     
00024     int n: EIG_MAX;     // Probably not necessary!
00025                         // See what is to be done in case of non-trivial Jordan canonical forms
00026 };
